title: Hamilton Beach® Mess Free Belgian Style Waffle Maker 26042
description:
• No more messy drips
• 3x protection against mess:
- Premeasured batter cup for the perfect amount
- Deep grid design
- Batter overflow channel
• Adjustable browning
• Nonstick grids for easy cleanup
• Power on and ready lights
• Cup nests for storage

asset.author: HamiltonBeachBrands

transcripts: Hi I'm Cara with Hamilton Beach don't you just love Belgian waffles like fluffy dripping with butter and syrup or topped with strawberries and whipped cream. Everyone enjoys eating homemade waffles but no one likes cleaning up the mess left behind we've got the perfect solution the new Hamilton Beach mess free Belgian waffle maker it has three times the mess protection ordinary well homemakers. First the batter cap is designed to hold exactly the amount you need for a perfectly shaped awful every time, second the deep great design keeps the batter inside the non-stick grid and third overflow channel keeps any excess batter for leaking onto the counter. The adjustable temperature dial allows you to control the Browning see your wall cook exactly the way you want it the power in reading lights let you know when your waffle is done. Now that's good thinking.
